sentences.sentence: New research says that those who can't seem to keep their inner monologues in are actually more likely to stay on task, remain focused better and show improved perception capabilities.
sentences.translation: 新研究发现，那些可能无法将自己的内心独白深埋于心的人实际上更有可能坚持完成任务，注意力更集中，并表现出较高的认知能力。

sentences.sentence: You don't have to listen year after year to the same monologues.
sentences.translation: 你不必年复一年地听同样的独白。

sentences.sentence: Carson had been having a field day with the speech in his monologues.
sentences.translation: 卡森已经忙了一整天构思在他的独脚戏中的演讲辞。
